# Dazzle - LLM Agent Index

> This file helps AI agents navigate Dazzle documentation.
> For full content export, see llms-full.txt

## Quick Facts

- **What**: DSL-first toolkit for building apps from specifications
- **Language**: Python 3.11+, HTMX/Jinja2 templates, Alpine.js
- **Repository**: https://github.com/manwithacat/dazzle
- **Docs Site**: https://manwithacat.github.io/dazzle/

## Key Commands

```bash
dazzle init my_app        # Create new project
dazzle validate           # Validate DSL files
dazzle dnr serve          # Run development server
dazzle dnr serve --local  # Run without Docker
```

## Core DSL Concepts

### Entity (Data Model)
```dsl
entity Task "Task":
  id: uuid pk
  title: str(200) required
  status: enum[todo, done] = todo
```

### Surface (UI View)
```dsl
surface task_list "Tasks" -> Task list:
  section main:
    field title "Title"
    field status "Status"
```

### Workspace (Layout)
```dsl
workspace dashboard "Dashboard":
  region main:
    surface task_list
  region panel:
    surface task_detail
```

## MCP Tools

When working with Dazzle projects, these MCP tools are available:

| Tool | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| validate_dsl | Check DSL syntax and semantics |
| list_modules | List project modules |
| inspect_entity | Examine entity definition |
| analyze_patterns | Detect CRUD patterns |
| lookup_concept | Look up DSL syntax |

## Common Patterns

### Full CRUD Entity
```dsl
entity Item:
  id: uuid pk
  name: str(200) required

surface item_list -> Item list
surface item_detail -> Item view
surface item_create -> Item create
surface item_edit -> Item edit
```

### Relationship
```dsl
entity Order:
  customer: Customer.id required  # FK reference
```

### Computed Field
```dsl
entity Order:
  subtotal: decimal(10,2)
  tax: decimal(10,2)
  total: computed = subtotal + tax
```
